page.title: 19Leisure in Gt Cornard
page.content: Sport of one kind or another is well catered for in Cornard. The Sports Centre caters for many indoor games such as badminton, netball and basket ball, as well as having an outdoor swimming pool. The main outdoor sports are football in the winter and cricket in the summer. Youth football teams are Spartans and Dynamoes and there are several adult teams - United, Ramblers, etc. Many girls and some boys from the age of five upwards are involved in majorettes. They spend many hours practising their music and marching and have done well in some nationally organised competitions. They are often to be seen at local events in the summer. Angling is a popular sport for young and old. The Stour has some fine fishing. Pubs are well patronised, most homes have television and many now have video and computers.
